# Project Memories Index

---

## How to Use This Index

1. Find the memory by topic above
2. Look up the memory file name (e.g., `memory_0001.md`)
3. Read the full memory in `.github/memory/memories/memory_XXXX.md`
4. Use tags (e.g., `#dotnet`) to search related memories

## Adding a New Memory

When using `/save` command:
1. Create the memory file
2. Add an entry here with memory file name and tags
3. Keep memories organized by topic
